title: Augmented Reality-Based Job-Related Mathematics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practice-Oriented Education to Strengthen Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies in Offline Classroom Settings Using Smartphone-Based Augmented Reality Tools

learning_goals: Learners can solve job-related math problems (e.g., spatial measurement, data visualization) implemented via augmented reality applications with 80% accuracy
Learners perform mathematical modeling at least three times through collaborative problem-solving processes in augmented reality environments
Learners analyze at least three mathematical elements of real-world job scenarios using augmented reality-based learning tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
